HediffDef.label: old wooden leg
HediffDef.labelNoun: an old wooden leg, probably found somewhere in the trash or taken from some tramp. As a prosthesis, there is almost no benefit, but it will allow you to lift someone to his feet.

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VI
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". A good and cheap replacement for eyes with impaired vision. Provides the ability to see up to 8192 colors. Released 25 years ago, out of production.

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VII
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech". Better efficiency, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VII: Combat Edition
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the military. Better efficiency, improves shooting accuracy, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

HediffDef.label: CyberVision VII: Medical Edition
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic eye implant from the Galactic corporation "LifeTech", designed specifically for the healthcare companies. Better efficiency, improves the quality of medical operations, perceives more colors up to 12288. Released 10 years ago.

HediffDef.label: Simple Speech Implant
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic simple speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.

HediffDef.label: Advanced Speech Implant
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic advanced speech implant from the corporation "Amazystems", designed to improve social qualities and increase the quality of social life.

HediffDef.label: Small Research AI Assistant
HediffDef.labelNoun: Small brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to boost research speed.

HediffDef.label: Medium Research AI Assistant
HediffDef.labelNoun: Medium brain implant from "Blossom Co.", designed to to boost research speed.

HediffDef.label: Big Research AI Assistant
HediffDef.labelNoun: Big brain implant from "Blossom Co.", to boost research speed.

HediffDef.label: Fixed leg prosthesis
HediffDef.labelNoun: this limb can hardly be called comfortable.

HediffDef.label: metal joints for legs
HediffDef.labelNoun: movable joints increase mobility.

HediffDef.label: prosthesis leg with metal plates
HediffDef.labelNoun: plates on the surface of the prosthesis provide shape retention.

HediffDef.label: prosthesis leg with simple mechanical sensors
HediffDef.labelNoun: Sensors on the surface of the prosthesis increase adaptation.

HediffDef.label: prosthesis leg with sensors
HediffDef.labelNoun: advanced sensors accelerate owner adaptation.

HediffDef.label: shock absorbing joints
HediffDef.labelNoun: allow you to increase the overall speed of the owner but still can not compete with natural legs.

HediffDef.label: mobile prosthesis with initial sensitivity
HediffDef.labelNoun: the combination of technology has brought prosthetics closer to a new level.

HediffDef.label: Active hydraulic foot prosthesis
HediffDef.labelNoun: sufficiently strong prosthesis provides high mobility.

HediffDef.label: Hydraulic foot prosthesis with sensors
HediffDef.labelNoun: additional weight gain due to various sensors gave the prosthesis an average sensitivity.

HediffDef.label: Sports mechanical prosthesis
HediffDef.labelNoun: professional athletes turn to this prosthesis after limb loss.

HediffDef.label: Sports prosthesis S1
HediffDef.labelNoun: updated hip prosthesis system for greater comfort and maximum safety while walking.

HediffDef.label: Sports prosthesis S2
HediffDef.labelNoun: advanced prosthesis S1 increased its mobility.

HediffDef.label: Knee joint
HediffDef.labelNoun: Knee joint with manual locking and hydraulic squat support for balanced and stable movements.

HediffDef.label: Foot Meridium
HediffDef.labelNoun: Foot Meridium an electronically controlled artificial foot, almost completely simulating the anatomical shape of the human foot.

HediffDef.label: MK1 cybernetic leg prosthesis
HediffDef.labelNoun: First version of cybernetic prostheses for the MK1 suit.

HediffDef.label: MK1 cybernetic advanced leg prosthesis
HediffDef.labelNoun: The second version of the cyber prosthesis from MK1.

HediffDef.label: MK1 final cybernetic leg prosthesis
HediffDef.labelNoun: Latest version of the prosthetic leg from MK1.

HediffDef.label: Simple heart pump
HediffDef.labelNoun: Prosthesis designed to allow the host to live.

HediffDef.label: Improved heart pump
HediffDef.labelNoun: Acceleration of rhythmic movements alleviated the negative effects of heart loss.

HediffDef.label: Prosthesis for the heart
HediffDef.labelNoun: The first prosthesis for the heart, created on a large scale.

HediffDef.label: Advanced prosthesis M2
HediffDef.labelNoun: The second prosthesis M2 combines technology from different eras, while at the same time cheap to manufacture.

HediffDef.label: Serial heart prosthesis M3
HediffDef.labelNoun: The latest version of the prosthesis increases human capabilities by several percent.

HediffDef.label: Sports pacemaker S1
HediffDef.labelNoun: It has simple metabolic acceleration systems.

HediffDef.label: Biochemistry pacemaker S2
HediffDef.labelNoun: It significantly surpasses its counterpart by accelerating life systems.

HediffDef.label: Rhythmic Cardioprosthesis MK1
HediffDef.labelNoun: The first MK1 line prosthesis designed to enhance combat quality owners.

HediffDef.label: Final pacemaker MK1
HediffDef.labelNoun: The perfect denture in the MK1 range.

HediffDef.label: Simple сatheter
HediffDef.labelNoun: A catheter that partially simulates the functioning of the kidney.

HediffDef.label: Improved kidney catheter
HediffDef.labelNoun: Advanced kidney replacement catheter.

HediffDef.label: Artificial kidney
HediffDef.labelNoun: First artificial kidney.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic kidney
HediffDef.labelNoun: First artificial kidney.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic body filtration system
HediffDef.labelNoun: Biochemical filtration system.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic filtration system MK1
HediffDef.labelNoun: The first MK1 body filtration system.

HediffDef.label: Advanced MK1 Filtration System
HediffDef.labelNoun: Better biofilter system MK1.

HediffDef.label: NanoBots: Basic Version
HediffDef.labelNoun: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. This version has basic functionality, but has less characteristics than advanced versions and gives immunity to only a small set of diseases.

HediffDef.label: Nanobots: Standard Version
HediffDef.labelNoun: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The standard version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to a larger set of dangerous diseases.

HediffDef.label: NanoBots: Advanced Version
HediffDef.labelNoun: Nanobots are very small robots that ply inside the body, hunting down and killing viruses and infections, filtering external toxins and processing food to keep the host healthy. The advanced version provides reliable protection of health and gives immunity to the entire set of dangerous diseases.

HediffDef.label: Synthetic lung
HediffDef.labelNoun: Synthetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with improved parameters.

HediffDef.label: Cybernetic lung
HediffDef.labelNoun: Cybernetic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung, but with better parameters than a synthetic lung and has a long lifespan.

HediffDef.label: Bionic lung
HediffDef.labelNoun: Bionic lung is a artifical organ that performs the function of a real lung and is the most advanced option among similar prosthetics, as it easily adapts to the body, does not cause sepsis and has a number of improved parameters.
